I believe in fighting for human rights around the globe and combating human trafficking both domestically and abroad. I have introduced bipartisan legislation to crack down on this horrible practice and will continue to lead efforts to curb human rights abuses. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DSFVqUJU8AEzTLG.jpg

Here are the pressing issues Congress must address once we get back to Washington:
✅ Passing the #DreamAct
✅ Long-term funding for CHIP
✅ Disaster aid funding 
✅ Funding for community health centers
I remain committed to fighting for raising the minimum wage, making public colleges and universities tuition-free, and guaranteeing access to health care for everyone.
